name: IRWIN Tools Hanson Machine Screw/Fractional/Metric Tap and Hex Die and Drill Bit Deluxe Set, 117 Piece 26377, Silver/Blue

Contains 117 of the most commonly needed machine screw plug tap and hex die sizes, drill bits, spiral screw extractors, an adjustable handle tap wrench, 2-in-1 tap wrench, t-handle wrench, pitch gauges, and a plastic case
product_description: The IRWIN HANSON Machine Screw/Fractional/Metric Tap and Hex Die and Drill Bit Deluxe Set contains almost every tap, hex die, and drill bit a craftsman may need for maintenance and auto repair work. This massive set features tools perfectly crafted for hand-threading a variety of materials. Crafted of high carbon steel they provide the accuracy professional craftsmen rely on to get the job done right the first time.

name: toolant 127pcs SAE/Metric Tap and Die Set, Ratcheting SAE Metric TAP and Die Set Standard with Drill Bit Combo for Threading
short_description: MAKE THE JOB MORE EFFORTLESS - compared with normal wrench, REVERSIBLE RATCHETING T HANDLES have the advantages of one-way rotation and efficient transmission, allowing users to easily control rotation direction and speed while generating greater force with less effort. toolant ratcheting wrench with 5° swing arc and has a reversing lever to eliminate hand-over-hand turning, twist lock guide system reduces the 'walk back' of the die guide and keeps the dies centered while cutting;

SAVING CUSTOMERS' TIME in selecting the correct drill bits - toolant sae metric tap and die set is equipped with drill bits of corresponding sizes for different taps, it reduces customers' learning time, no need to repeatedly check the corresponding table,which avoids production issues due to missing or mismatched drill bits, further improving production efficiency and reducing costs;

DECENT PORTABLE TOOL BOX - comprehensive storage container with drawers that allows you to organize accessories of different sizes in their designated compartments, making it easy to retrieve sae metric tap and die set and convenient to carry around;

AFTER SALE WARRANTY - as a responsible company deeply committed to the tools category,we will always stand by our sae metric tap and die set, accessories are guaranteed for 180 DAYS and main tool body is guaranteed for ONE YEAR. if you experience any quality issues or accidental damage within the warranty period, please contact us for replacement parts;
NOTES - sae metric tap and die set for general purpose use, equal to ISO3/2B tolerance grade, suitable for 6H grade nut;

name: Hi-Spec 39 Piece SAE & Metric Tap & Die Set. Complete M3 to M12 / #4 to 1/2in Fine & Coarse Tools to Cut, Chase and Thread with Screw Pitch Gauge in a Tray Case
short_description: Durable Alloy Steel Construction: Taps and dies made from premium GCr15 alloy steel; built for use against carbon alloy steel, cast iron, aluminium, brass and bronze
Versatile SAE & Metric Sizes: Includes 34 taps and dies; covers both fine and coarse threading for a wide range of applications
Complete Tap & Die Range: Features 9 plug taps and 8 taper taps; tackle various threading jobs with precision, from M3 to M12 and #4 to 1/2in
Accurate Thread Measurement: 16-blade screw pitch gauge included; easily measure thread pitch in both SAE (13 to 40 TPI) and Metric (0.5 to 1.75)
Ergonomic Wrench Handles: Includes T-handle tap wrench, tap wrench, and die wrench; designed for secure grip and control during threading tasks

name: EFFICERE 40-Piece Premium Tap and Die Set, SAE Unified Screw Thread, Size #4 to 1/2” | Include UNC Coarse, UNF Fine and NPT Threads | Essential Threading Tool Kit with Complete Handles and Accessories
short_description: ▲ WIDE APPLICATIONS: Perfect kit to create new threads, chase existing threads, or repair damaged threads on most metals like aluminum, brass, bronze, cast iron, mild steel, carbon steel, stainless steel and more
▲ PREMIUM QUALITY: Industrial grade hardened GCr-15 alloy steel construction provides maximum strength and durability, and meets ANSI/ASME B1.1 standards for guaranteed quality
▲ EXCELLENT CUTTING PERFORMANCE: All cutting teeth are precisely CNC machined and accurately heat treated to Rockwell hardness 60 HRC for best threading performance

▲ MOST POPULAR SIZE: Includes a full range of most commonly used tap & die sizes for unified screw threads (UN-Series). Coarse Thread (UNC): #4-40, #6-32, #8-32, #10-24, #12-24, 1/4-20, 5/16-18, 3/8-16, 7/16-14, 1/2-13; Fine Thread (UNF): #10-32, 1/4-28, 5/16-24, 3/8-24, 7/16-20, 1/2-20; Pipe Thread (NPT): 1/8-27

▲ ALL-IN-ONE SET: Set completes with all the parts and accessories that you need for your threading or rethreading jobs: tap wrenches, die stock, thread pitch gauge, screwdriver, plus a heavy duty carry case for easy organizing and storage

name: Bosch BDT11S 11Piece Tap & Drill Combo Set
short_description: Heat-treated carbon steel provides long life and clean, accurate threads
Rolled threads provide more accuracy than machined threads
Laser-etched marking ensures size identification won't wear off
Set Tailored for most general-purpose applications with premium efficiency
product_description: The Bosch Tap and Drill Bit Combo Set features five taps and five correspondingly sized drill bits. This helps ensure drilling the proper hole size before cutting internal threads. Plug taps are ideal for cutting right-hand internal threads; they are the most widely used type of tap, with three to five threads chamfered for general-purpose applications. The included drill bit is matched to the tap for the proper hole size. The bit is designed with split points to reduce bit walking for clean, accurate starts. The bit’s speed helix design promotes fast drilling. The plug tap is recommended when there is sufficient room on a blind hole and tapping to the bottom of a hole is not critical. Made from heat-treated carbon steel, it is a rust- and tarnish-resistant tool. The rolled threads are more accurate and cleaner than machined threads. They are tooled to the most exacting specifications to ensure that bolts anchor securely. Laser-etched marking ensures size identification and won't wear off. They feature a precise flute design to ensure fast and easy chip clearance. The included T-Handle tap wrench is used to securely hold taps to be turned by hand.

name: Valkynos Drill Tap Set with Quick-Change Adapter of 13Pcs, 6 SAE Sizes: 6-32NC to 1/4-20NC, 6 Metric Sizes: M3 to M10, Titanium Combination Drill & Tap Bit Set for Drilling Threads, Tapping
short_description: 3-IN-1 for Drill Tap Countersink: Our Combination Drill & Taps Bit Set streamlines drilling, tapping, and countersinking functions into one, allowing you to accomplish tasks without changing bits. Compatible with a variety of drills including handheld drills, bench drills, and electric screwdrivers, this set saves valuable time and effort across different drilling machines

12 SAE and Metric Sizes: Prepare for various projects with our drill and tap set, featuring 6 SAE sizes: 6-32NC, 8-32NC, 10-24NC, 10-32NC, 12-24NC, 1/4"-20NC, and 6 metric sizes: M3 x 0.5, M4 x 0.7, M5 x 0.8, M6 x 1.0, M8 x 1.25, M10 x 1.5, ensuring versatility for different threading needs

Designed for Metalworking: These drill bits are expertly crafted from high-speed steel, ensuring durability and precision in metalworking applications. Suitable for a wide range of materials including thin sheets or metal plates up to 1/4 inch thick, copper, brass, aluminum, plastics, and more. From industrial workshops to DIY projects, these versatile tools deliver reliable performance across various metalworking tasks

Convenient Features: Our tap drill bit set includes a 1/4-inch hex shank quick-change adapter for easy use and extended reach. Neatly arranged in a storage box with clearly marked compartments, allowing for precise selection and organized storage

User Tips: For optimal results, remember: 1) Drill slowly and avoid excessive force; 2) Use an ample amount of cutting oil; 3) Take time for precise workmanship; 4) Cut and retract a bit before recutting for better results; 5) When dealing with tougher metals, pre-drill a pilot hole for guidance. These tips ensure efficient and effective usage, enhancing your overall experience with our product

name: Craftsman Tap & Die SET 50pc Sae-met
short_description: Set includes: 6 drive tools, 11 Inch taps, 11 Inch dies, 11 MM taps, & 11 MM dies.

name: Segomo Tools 60 Piece Metric & SAE Threading Tap & Die Tool Set - TD60MMSAE
short_description: [ EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE ] 60 piece comprehensive tap and die set, ideal for cutting and renewing external and internal threads to exact standards. The tapered teeth of these threading tools are specially designed to start threading easily and smoothly and prevent overthreading. [ FREE CUTTING FLUID ] Supplied with a free bottle of Tap Magic Ep-Xtra 4 ounce cutting fluid.
[ EASY STORAGE ] Supplied in a heavy-duty plastic blow-molded carrying case for easy transportation, safe storage and quick organization.
[ DURABLE DESIGN ] This large tap and die set is constructed from hardened alloy steel for maximum strength and longevity and can cut materials such as cast iron, steel, aluminum, copper.

[ METRIC DIE SIZES ] 3x0.5, 4x0.7, 5x0.8, 6x1.0, 7x1.0, 8x1.25, 9x1.25, 10x1.0, 10x1.5, 12x1.75. UNC Die Sizes: 4-40, 6-32, 8-32, 10-24, 12-24, 1/4, 5/16, 3/8, 7/16, 1/2. UNF Die Sizes: 10-32, 1/4, 5/16, 3/8, 7/16, 1/2. NPT Tap: 1/8-27. NPT Die: 1/8-27. Tap Wrench: M4-M12 3/16-1/2". T-Type Tap Wrench: M3-M16 1/16-1/4". 1 x flat screwdriver. 2 x thread gauges. 1 x small tap chuck

name: 86 pcs Tap and Die Set, SAE and Metric Standard, Large Tap and Die Set with Hex Shape, Titanium Coated Tap and Die Set with Storage Case, All-in-One Tap and Die Set
short_description: 86 PCS TAP & DIE SET SIZES - Includes 39 taps (metric and SAE), 39 dies (in metric & SAE), adjustable tap wrench, adjustable die wrench, T-handle tap wrench, standard die wrench, metric & pitch gauge, iron rod, and screwdriver. The T-handle wrench secures taps to provide additional leverage for hand tapping ideal for confined spaces or where extra reach or leverage is required. T-handle tap wrenches may also be used with screw extractors, drills, and other tools.

EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE - Industrial grade GCr15 bearing steel (AISI 52100 equivalent) construction ensures durability and tool longevity to withstand professional uses. Fully ground teeth ensure efficient chip removal. And precise teeth geometry keeps cutting smoothly with efficiency. TiN coating enhances corrosion resistance and extends tool life.

APPLICATION - Suitable for creating new threads and repairing internal and external threads on most metals like steel, iron, aluminum, brass and copper. Ideal for cutting fasteners' thread for automotive, machinery repair, and field work. Perfect tap and die set for professional craftsmen and maintenance technicians.

ESSENTIAL FOR ANY FASTENER JOB - This comprehensive set provides essential threading tools. They create internal and external threads easily on 39 sizes. They're perfect for helping re-thread damaged existing threads. All cutting teeth are precisely CNC machined and precision heat-treated to 60±1 HRC for best threading performance.

PACKAGE - This set comes with a full range of most popular metric taps & dies with both coarse and fine sizes, plus all needed essential threading tool kit including both long and short wrenches, flat-head screwdrivers and gauges to find and carve the exact threading. Tools are organized in molded plastic holders within a reinforced iron case. The packaging of the set makes it easy to transport, safe to store, ensures quick organization and secure accessory retention.

name: Azuno 40PCS Metric Tap and Die Set, Titanium Coated GCr15 Bearing Steel with T-Handle/Wrench/Gauge/Screwdriver in Storage Case, Essential Threading
short_description: 【40pcs Titanium Coated Tap and Die】: Set includes 34 taps & dies, 1 die handle, 1 T-tap wrench, 2 screw-pitch Gauge, 1 screwdriver, 1 tap wrench. Constructed by quality GCr15 bearing steel with titanium coating that ensures higher durability in threading.
【Most Common Sizes in Metric】: 16 Dies & Taps: M3x0.5,M3x0.6,M4x0.7,M4x0.75,M5x0.8,M5x0.9,M6x1.0,M6x0.75,M7x0.75,M7x1,M8x1.25,M8x1.0,M10*1.25,M10x1.5,M12x1.75,M12x1.5; NPT Dies & Taps: 1/8-27;

【Performance and Durability】: CNC machined Tap and Dies made by industry-grade GCr15 bearing steel with pronounced hardness and balanced ductility. Titanium coating on the finish ensures higher durability on hard metal.
【Easy for Storage】: Comes with a heavy-duty storage case, convenient for storage and carrying. It has identified slot for each piece so that to keep neat and easy finding.

【Versatile Threading Tool Set】： This professional set is perfect for cutting and renewing external and internal threads to exact standards. Durable to process on hard metal such as alloy, steel and brass, for all-day performance in the shop or home project.
product_description: AZUNO 40-Piece Premium Metric Tap and Die Set is the perfect choice for your hand threading jobs at home, garage and shop. It can be used to either cut new threads or chase existing threads. This set is made from highly durable GCr15 bearing steel, and cuts through a wide range of metal pipes and rods including carbon steel, cast iron, stainless steel, aluminum, brass, copper and much more. All the cutting teeth are professionally CNC (computer numerical controlled) machined and heat treated to Rockwell hardness 60 HRC for providing aggressive, clean and precise threading results. The taps and dies also feature a tapered design, allowing an easier start and preventing over threading. Set Includes: (17) Taps; (17) Dies; (1) Long Handle Adjustable Tap Wrench; (1) T-Handle Tap Wrench; (1) Adjustable Die Wrench; (1) Mini 1/8” Flat Screwdriver; (1) Thread Pitch Gauge; (1) Heavy Duty Storage Case; Tap and Die Sizes: Coarse Thread: 3 x 0.5, 3 x 0.6, 4 x 0.7, 4 x 0.75, 5 x 0.8, 5 x 0.9, 6 x 1.0, 7 x 1.0, 8 x 1.25, 10 x 1.5, 12 x 1.75; Fine Thread: 6 x 0.75, 7 x 0.75, 8 x 1.0, 10 x 1.25, 12 x 1.5; Pipe Thread (NPT): 1/8 NPT 27;
